Title: Zettai Shougeki: Platonic Heart
Description: ['The story centers on the Platonic Heart, a jewel that—according to an old urban legend—can grant any wish when collected. Only a chosen few are allowed to compete in the Platonic Heart hunt, and high school junior Aya Iseshima is one of 11 girls and women who are taking part.']
Characters: ['Iseshima, Aya', 'Hiroishi, Rin', 'Honma, Natsume', 'Kakizaki, Rei', 'Kazuki, Miko', 'Daimonji, Saki', 'Honma, Haruki', 'Shimoyama, Megumi', 'Hayakawa, Izumi', 'Daimonji, Yu']
Voices: ['Nazuka, Kaori', 'Miyazaki, Ui', 'Akesaka, Satomi', 'Kaida, Yuuko', 'Nonaka, Ai', 'Kawaragi, Shiho', 'Suzuki, Tatsuhisa', 'Hirata, Hiromi', 'Shintani, Ryouko']
Staff: [['Fujimoto, Yoshitaka', 'Director'], ['Shimizu, Katsunori', 'Sound Director'], ['Clark, Leah', 'Script'], ['Shirane, Hideki', 'Script, Series Composition, Screenplay']]
